PathOfBuilding.Notes:
List of spectres https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Xv_gYwP64s - Hunting party: good chaos projs, dots rain, found in hunter influence maps
Chaos Fanatic spectres (chaos fireballs) https://youtu.be/qZFEGlQwJoI To get them, spec into Invasive Adversaries node on Atlas tree and now you have a chance for them to appear in any map.
Skeleton Archers https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ca8MnptgC-o
